data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during La Princesa cruise from La Coruña to Montevideo started at 1774-04-16
Ship: La Princesa (Paquebot), Voyage: La Coruña - Montevideo, 1st Observer: Manuel de Abona (Capitan)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
